page.shortlink: Duplicate and Copy Rows in a Repeating Section
page.topic: Duplicate and Copy Rows in a Repeating Section
page.description: There are several methods that you can use with repeating sections to give them additional functionality such as the ability to duplicate rows, override existing rows, and copy rows.

section.description: For more on how to implement methods to duplicate and/or copy the rows in a repeating section watch [this video] or follow the guide below.
